sys_hub_trigger_instance_v2.comment: links the LR to this workflow if Item is "Laptop", and State is "Reserved", then...
sys_hub_trigger_instance_v2.name: Created or Updated

sys_hub_action_instance_v2.comment: Updates the state of the Parent LR to "Close Record"....and done!
waits until the LR state changes to Deployment Prep, then...
creates a task for Deployment Prep - and waits until the LR task is closed, then...
creates a Post Deployment Task and waits until the LR task is Closed, then...
waits until the state of the loaner request is changed to "Post Deployment", then...
Updates the parent LR with a state of "ready for pickup",then...
